name: Vegan Chocolate Mousse Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: chickpea water, dark chocolate, sugar, vanilla extract
recipeIngredient: ½ cup dark (vegan) chocolate, melted and cooled slightly
recipeInstructionSteps: In a medium-sized bowl, beat aquafaba until stiff peaks form.
Gently fold in melted chocolate, sugar, and vanilla, being careful not to overmix.
Distribute mousse into 3 cups and chill for at least 3 hours, ideally overnight.
Garnish with fresh strawberries or fruit of choice.
